title: "trying to reconnect"
body: i always get the error "**trying to reconnect**" but my internet is fine in-game and everywhere else, and i even queue with my friends but when i do queue i hear the accept but do not see so i **cannot** accept, i reinstalled the game completely and still didn't work and the disconnect is only 5-10 secs, when i do get into a game i need to restart my client because it doesn't show stats nor can i use it please help!

replies.body: Even if your internet is fine, you can still have problems reaching a specific service like pvp.net or our game servers.  A reinstall won't really resolve this if the issue is with your network and not game files.  You should go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve anything that might block access to our service as well as  any degradation that may fail to transition you from one service to another.  I hope that helps!
